Package imagingbook.pub.regions

Class RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Point>
    Enclosing class:
    RegionLabeling
    public class RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Point>
    This class of RegionLabeling represents a connected component or binary region. It is implemented as an inner class to RegionLabeling because it references common region labeling data. A RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion instance does not have its own list or array of contained pixel coordinates but refers to the region label-array of the enclosing RegionLabeling instance. Instances of this class support iteration over the contained pixel coordinates of type Point, e.g., by 
     import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
 
 BinaryRegion R = ...;
 for (Point p : R) {
    // process point p ...
 }
    The advantage of providing iteration only is that it avoids the creation of (possibly large) arrays of pixel coordinates.

      • addPixel

        protected void addPixel​(int u,
                        int v)
        Use this method to add a single pixel to this region. Updates summation and boundary variables used to calculate various region statistics.
        Parameters:
        u - x-position
        v - y-position

      • update

        protected void update()
        Call this method to update the region's statistics. For now only the center coordinates (xc, yc) are updated. Add additional statements as needed to update your own region statistics.

      • getOuterContour

        public Contour getOuterContour()
        Get the (single) outer contour of this region. Points on an outer contour are arranged in clockwise order.
        Returns:
        the outer contour.

        public java.util.List<Contour> getInnerContours()

        the list of inner contours.
